Html: I downloaded and installed the version 3.0 Beta 1. I ran the project and everything seems fine. I did notice that I dont see forums or blogs as part of the site I created. I am using VWD and I created a new web site from the Club Starter Kit template. Any thoughts?
Did you run the Data.sql file against your DB? That is, if you aren't using the DB from the App_Data folder.

No I didn't know there was one. I am using the DB that came with the package. I see the file you are speaking about in the original download folder but I'm not sure how to run it. Also, I was reading the upgrade notice but I dont see how to run the Tablechanger app.

z2bass wrote:
Did you run the Data.sql file against your DB? That is, if you aren't using the DB from the App_Data folder.

I downloaded Sql Server Management Studio Express and ran the Data.sql script but I got a huge list of errors. As an FYI, I am just running this site on my laptop as it is not live yet. Found some other posts with similar problems. Since I originally downloaded the Version 3.0 Beta 1, I am assuming that I dont have to download the V2 to V3 Beta 1 Upgrade and I just have to run the Data.sql script from the original Version 3.0 beta 1 package download.
